div.div: This search form uses an instant search feature. As you type, search results will appear automatically below the search field. When you've entered you desired search terms use tab to navigate through the available results and hit enter to open the selected page or document.

hr.h5: Our mission is to provide a quality education through shared responsibility in a safe supportive environment for all students to meet the challenges of a global society.

div.p: Here's a job opportunity for the next school year. Come join a great team at Centennial! view image

Parents of children eligible to be in Kindergarten, please enroll soon!! We are excited for our new Kinder class! If you do not have paperwork, please contact Mr. Booth at ken.booth@centennialbroncos.org. Send or drop off at the district office M-F, 9-1pm. Go Broncos!

Parents of Preschool Children!! Reminder to enroll your preschooler now for the Lil' Broncos Preschool for the 2020-21 school year. If you do not have an application please email Mrs. Kris Elmshaeuser at kris.elmshaeuser@centennialbroncos.org
Booster club meeting will be tonight, Thursday, April 16th, at 7:30 PM via Zoom. Booster club members check your email for meeting details. See you tonight!

COACHING OPPORTUNITIES Head Softball Coach Assistant Wrestling Coach Come join our great Centennial coaching staff and make a difference in our student-athletes. Help grow the success of our programs. Questions please contact Jenny Wagner - jenny.wagner@centennialbroncos.org view image

Due to our continued commitment to the health and safety of our students,Â staff, and community. Centennial will be closed until further notice as recommended by Governor Ricketts and Commissioner of Education Matt Blomstedt. We will work with state and local officials to reevaluate this situation every two weeks to determine our next steps. Â

Centennial staff has been working hard to put together a "Temporary Distance Learning Plan" that will begin on Monday, 3/23/20.Â Despite this plan being different from our students' typical school day, we hope that we can continue to move our students forward in their education. This plan includes a combination of activities, non-digital and digital learning opportunities all customized to your child's grade level. You can view this plan and other resources by clicking on the â€œDistance Learningâ€ link at the top of our website homepage.
